'''Beta 1.18.10.27''' is the sixth beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.18.10]], released on January 11, 2022,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/4420146557325|title=Minecraft Beta - 1.18.10.27 (Xbox / Windows / Android)|website=feedback.minecraft.net|date=January 11, 2022}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Settings]]'''
* Added "Thumbstick Opacity" option to the touch controls settings.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Boat]]s'''
* Changed item textures from [[File:Oak Boat (item) JE4 BE3.png|32px]] [[File:Spruce Boat (item) JE2 BE3.png|32px]] [[File:Birch Boat (item) JE2 BE3.png|32px]] [[File:Jungle Boat (item) JE2 BE3.png|32px]] [[File:Acacia Boat (item) JE2 BE3.png|32px]] [[File:Dark Oak Boat (item) JE2 BE3.png|32px]] to [[File:Oak Boat (item) BE4.png|32px]] [[File:Spruce Boat (item) BE4.png|32px]] [[File:Birch Boat (item) JE3 BE4.png|32px]] [[File:Jungle Boat (item) JE3 BE4.png|32px]] [[File:Acacia Boat (item) JE3 BE4.png|32px]] [[File:Dark Oak Boat (item) JE3 BE4.png|32px]]. The paddles now represent their respective wood color (except spruce) and the inside rims of the boats are darker.
** The new item texture for dark oak boat has been changed in texture file, but it's not visible in the game.<ref>{{bug|MCPE-151667}}</ref>

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Cat]]s'''
* Untamed cats can now be leashed.

=== Technical ===
'''Stability and Performance'''
* Reduced memory and load times for ticking areas.

== Experimental ==
These additions and changes are accessible by enabling the "Enable GameTest Framework" and "Enable Molang Features" experimental toggle.

=== Technical ===
'''GameTest Framework'''
* Added function <code>setVelocity(velocity: Vector): bool</code> - Sets the velocity of this entity.
* Added property <code>viewVector: Vector</code> - Represents the direction that the entity is looking, as a vector.
* Added property <code>headLocation: Location</code> - Represents the location of the head of the entity.
* Added property <code>bodyRotation: number</code> - Represents the body rotation of the entity as a float (in degrees).

'''Molang'''
* Added alland <code>query.all</code> and <code>query.any</code> to check if a value matches all or any of the following values.
* Added <code>in_rangeto</code> check if a value is in the (inclusive) range between a min and max value.
* Added <code>query.in_range</code> to check if a value is in the (inclusive) range between a min and max value.

== Fixes ==
'''Experimental'''
* Frogs no longer eat goats. ({{bug|MCPE-151536}})

'''Blocks'''
* Cocoa pods placed on chunk borders don't break anymore upon reloading the world. ({{bug|MCPE-67479}})
* Structure block structures now correctly transform (rotate and/or mirror) multiface blocks (e.g. glow lichen).

'''Gameplay'''
* Fixed observer block retaining its lit state while in the inventory if destroyed while blinking. ({{bug|MCPE-114173}})
* Fixed a bug where paintings could overlap with glow item frames, signs, banners, and torches. ({{bug|MCPE-150198}})
* Pillager outposts now spawn the correct number of pillagers and golems. ({{bug|MCPE-141499}})

'''Graphical'''
* Boats will no longer disappear when getting out of them after a long ride. ({{bug|MCPE-108568}}) ({{bug|MCPE-125388}})
* Boat oars now have the same color as the boat. ({{bug|MCPE-150492}})

'''User Interface'''
* The Construction tab on the inventory screen now has the correct color when using Pocket UI. ({{bug|MCPE-90632}})
* Fixed an issue with missing Inventory slots when using Pocket UI. ({{bug|MCPE-151545}})
* Fixed an issue with blank inventory slots in the creative inventory, which could cause interaction issues in the world. ({{bug|MCPE-151506}})

'''World Generation'''
* Chests and monster spawners now spawn correctly in structures. ({{bug|MCPE-23416}}) ({{bug|MCPE-48622}}) ({{bug|MCPE-97295}})

'''Animation'''
* Fixed a bug where animation events, sound effect events, and particle events would not trigger if the event time specified was equal to the total "animation_length".
* Fixed an issue where event times were not considered within the animation length calculation that happens when "animation_length" is not explicitly specified.

'''General'''
* Fixed an issue that caused format_versions that are declared as numerical values rather than strings to be parsed properly.
* When creating a flat world from a template that has a base game version from before the Caves and Cliffs update, the layers will no longer be 64 blocks in the air.</onlyinclude>
